Mangalayatan University Online

Uttar Pradesh

NIRF | AICTE | UGC | WES

Study Mode: Distance

Institution Type : Private

About Mangalayatan University

Mangalayatan University was established in 2006, in the Uttar Pradesh state of India. The University has more than 250 faculties from the best institutions, with an alumni network of 6000+ students. The University has a beautiful campus that is located on 70 acres of area. The University offers many undergraduate and postgraduate courses in regular and online modes. The Online programs that are offered to the students by the university are B.A., B.C.A., & B.B.A. and Many postgraduate programs in English, political science, education, journalism, public administration, mathematics, commerce, computer applications, and many more.

This institute is approved by many credentials it is accredited by NAAC A+ grade, University Grants Commission, (UGC), Associations of Indian Universities, AICTE, Council of Architecture, Bar Council of India, Pharmacy Council of India, and NCTE (National Council for Teacher Education). Mangalayatan University is an innovative & dynamic institute that offers courses in higher education and is situated at Aligarh University. With various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in many disciplines like humanities, sciences, information technology, education, management & many more.

The University campus is equipped with all the facilities like high-tech laboratories, libraries, modern classrooms, and lecture halls. The university is well-equipped to offer holistic education to the students along with various extracurricular activities like cultural events, sports, community service, and many more that help in enhancing valuable qualities like leadership, teamwork, and clear communication skills.

After excelling in offering full-time courses, the University came up with the initiative to offer online study programs to students that can help students from all around the world to pursue the course. The University makes sure to research every program. All the courses are designed by a team of professionals. With the vision to transform the lives of students through education. The institution is on a mission to empower students to achieve the best of their potential.

Mangalayatan University offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various fields such as arts, science, commerce, management, engineering, law, and education. The university focuses on providing quality education and emphasizes innovation, research, and overall development of its students.

The faculty at Mangalayatan University comprises distinguished professors and renowned scholars who are committed to imparting knowledge and nurturing talent in the students. The university also provides various co-curricular and extracurricular activities to enhance the learning experience and skill development of the students.

Mangalayatan University is a reputed educational institution that offers a wide range of programs with an aim to produce competent and skilled professionals for the industry and society.

Mangalayatan University Online Admission Process

  • If you are looking to take admission to the University, you have three options. The first option is an online application form that can be filled out and submitted from anywhere in the country, on the official website of the university. The other option is to download the application form in pdf format and later fill up the form with the required details, affix a colored passport-size photograph, and photocopy the class X mark sheet. And then submit the form with DD for Rs 500/-. The final step is filling up the form and submitting the form at the respective center of the University. But if you are someone who is applying online, follow these steps.

    Step 1: The first step is to search for the best course from the available list of courses. Then, you can check the eligibility criteria for the same.

    Step 2: Make a new registration on the official website of the University. Fill in all the required details – Name of the Applicant, Phone number, Email Address, Marksheets, Passport Size Photograph, Aadhar Details, etc.

    Step 3: The next step after submitting the details is uploading the relevant documents on the portal.

    Step 4: Check the information filled in and then submit the fee. Please note that the application fee is non-refundable.

    Step 5: After verification of the documents and the details the University will update the admission confirmation through email. Students are advised to keep checking the website and login portal for new updates.

List of Documents
  • Marksheets
  • Residential Proof
  • Proof of Date of Birth
  • Government Issued ID
  • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
  • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
  • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
  • Two passport size colored photographs
  • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Why Mangalayatan University

Mangalayatan University was established in 2006, in the Uttar Pradesh state of India.

This institution is approved by many credentials it is accredited by NAAC A+ grade and UGC.

It is also approved by government credentials like Associations of Indian Universities, AICTE, Council of Architecture, Bar Council of India, Pharmacy Council of India, and National Council for Teacher Education.

The University campus is equipped with all the basic features like high-tech laboratories, libraries, modern classrooms, and lecture halls.

The University offers many undergraduate and postgraduate courses in regular and online modes.

The Online programs that are offered to the students by the university are B.A., B.C.A., & B.B.A., and many more.

Postgraduate courses are offered to students in English, political science, education, journalism, public administration, mathematics, commerce, computer applications, and many more.
